# Instructions

This repository contains LaTeX code to create a magazine-style layout with custom environments for Question-and-Answer articles, author names, a preamble, and inline-quotes.

## How to use

Download, clone, or fork the project directory, and then open the *magazine-latex-template.Rproj* file.
